content: Intended scope for a Connectahon event 26th May Sydney is on page http://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/Connectathon; the constant integration FHIR IG for that is http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/index.html around mid April will publish a static version for the event
@Grahame Grieve will we be able to do instance validation if we can load all these defintions?
ty - such capability is just soooo cool...
My server should be very close to being able to also.
great stuff - might make that one of the roles at the connectathon... validating server
For those of you at today's connectathon: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/6MJLFYZ
